<h3 id="X12705">X(12705)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: HEXYL TO 4th EXTOUCH</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+4*b*c*(b+c)*a^3+3*(b^2-c^2)^2*a^2-4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12705) = 2*X(3)-3*X(4512) = 3*X(3576)-4*X(5248) = 3*X(3576)-2*X(12520) = 2*X(3671)-3*X(5603) = 3*X(4512)-X(12565) = 3*X(5587)-4*X(12617) = 5*X(8227)-4*X(12609) = 5*X(10595)-4*X(12563)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(65).</p>
<p>X(12705) lies on these lines: {1,84}, {3,4512}, {4,9}, {5,3359}, {11,2950}, {12,12679}, {20,5250}, {46,1699}, {55,1490}, {57,946}, {63,962}, {72,6769}, {78,12529}, {90,3577}, {104,7091}, {165,3149}, {191,9589}, {196,1712}, {200,5777}, {226,8803}, {380,5776}, {390,9799}, {495,6259}, {497,6245}, {515,1697}, {517,3927}, {595,990}, {758,6762}, {774,2263}, {936,10310}, {942,3358}, {944,4314}, {960,6282}, {968,4300}, {971,3295}, {1001,8726}, {1056,12246}, {1181,1449}, {1385,7171}, {1389,7285}, {1420,5450}, {1453,3073}, {1486,9914}, {1519,5437}, {1537,1768}, {1621,9961}, {1728,2093}, {1750,11500}, {1765,2257}, {1788,7682}, {1836,5715}, {2077,5438}, {2096,4298}, {2136,5881}, {2800,3340}, {2829,9613}, {3057,12650}, {3062,7160}, {3085,6260}, {3176,7008}, {3303,12680}, {3333,3671}, {3576,5248}, {3601,6261}, {3683,5584}, {3731,8915}, {3870,12528}, {3928,12704}, {5044,6244}, {5119,5691}, {5219,12608}, {5231,5709}, {5285,9911}, {5441,7966}, {5534,10679}, {5687,5927}, {5693,11523}, {5720,11248}, {5768,9948}, {5884,11518}, {5918,8273}, {6256,9578}, {6326,12775}, {6684,7308}, {6767,12684}, {7675,9960}, {7680,9612}, {7967,9845}, {8081,12714}, {8111,12707}, {8112,12708}, {8234,12712}, {8235,12713}, {9581,12616}, {9709,10157}, {9940,10582}, {10042,10058}, {10476,12544}, {10595,12563}</p>
<p>
X(12705) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20,9800}, {4314,9949}, {12526,12651}<br>
X(12705) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,11496), (40,12514), (944,4314), (4295,946), (12520,5248), (12565,3)<br>
X(12705) = excentral-to-hexyl similarity image of X(12565)<br>
X(12705) = anticomplement, wrt hexyl triangle, of X(12520)<br>
X(12705) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1709,84), (1,1777,1394), (1,2956,222), (40,5587,1706), (40,11372,4), (55,12688,1490), (946,1158,57), (946,6705,3086), (1001,9943,8726), (1012,12672,1), (1519,6833,8227), (1621,9961,10884), (1768,11522,3338), (4512,12565,3), (5248,12520,3576), (5777,10306,200), (5881,12703,2136), (6212,6213,2270)<br>
</p>
